mcq.statement: Which two famous constructions are attributed to Qutb-ud-Din Aibak?

options.b: Adhai Din Ka Jhonpra and Red Fort
options.c: Qutb Minar and Adhai Din Ka Jhonpra

mcq.one_liner: Qutb-ud-Din Aibak is known for the development of **Qutb Minar in Delhi and Adhai Din Ka Jhonpra in Ajmer**.
